comment: * Class that holds information about single font variation axis.

variables.name: TAG_PATTERN
variables.comment:
* The 'tag' attribute value is read as four character values between U+0020 and U+007E
     * inclusive.

variables.name: STYLE_VALUE_PATTERN
variables.comment:
* The 'styleValue' attribute has an optional leading '-', followed by '<digits>',
     * '<digits>.<digits>', or '.<digits>' where '<digits>' is one or more of [0-9].

methods.name: public int getOpenTypeTagValue()
methods.comment:
* Returns the OpenType style tag value.
     * @hide

methods.name: public String getTag()
methods.comment: * Returns the variable font axis tag associated to this axis.

methods.name: public float getStyleValue()
methods.comment: * Returns the style value associated to the given axis for this font.

methods.name: public String toString()
methods.comment: * Returns a valid font variation setting string for this object.

methods.name: private static boolean isValidTag(String tagString)
methods.comment: * Returns true if 'tagString' is valid for font variation axis tag.

methods.name: public static FontVariationAxis[] fromFontVariationSettings(@Nullable String settings)
methods.comment:
* Construct FontVariationAxis array from font variation settings. * * The settings string is constructed from multiple pairs of axis tag and style values. The axis * tag must contain four ASCII characters and must be wrapped with single quotes (U+0027) or * double quotes (U+0022). Axis strings that are longer or shorter than four characters, or * contain characters outside of U+0020..U+007E are invalid. If a specified axis name is not * defined in the font, the settings will be ignored. * * 
     *   FontVariationAxis.fromFontVariationSettings("'wdth' 1.0");
     *   FontVariationAxis.fromFontVariationSettings("'AX  ' 1.0, 'FB  ' 2.0");
     *
* * @param settings font variation settings. * @return FontVariationAxis[] the array of parsed font variation axis. {@code null} if settings * has no font variation settings. * @throws IllegalArgumentException If given string is not a valid font variation settings * format.

methods.name: public static String toFontVariationSettings(@Nullable FontVariationAxis[] axes)
methods.comment:
* Stringify the array of FontVariationAxis.
     *
     * @param axes an array of FontVariationAxis.
     * @return String a valid font variation settings string.

methods.name: public static String toFontVariationSettings(@Nullable List<FontVariationAxis> axes)

methodNames: public static FontVariationAxis[] fromFontVariationSettings(@Nullable String settings)
public static String toFontVariationSettings(@Nullable FontVariationAxis[] axes)
public static String toFontVariationSettings(@Nullable List<FontVariationAxis> axes)
